required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Long-term Extension Study of Mirikizumab (LY3074828) in Participants With Crohn's Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Open-Label, Long-Term Extension Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Efficacy and Safety of Mirikizumab in Patients With Crohn's Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The reason for this study is to determine the long-term efficacy and safety of the study drug mirikizumab in participants with Crohn's disease.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Endoscopic Response
primary_outcome.description: Endoscopic response based on Simple Endoscopic Score for Crohn's Disease (SES-CD) total score

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Clinical Remission
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical remission by Patient Reported Outcome (PRO) based on stool frequency (SF) and abdominal pain (AP)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Endoscopic Remission
secondary_outcome.description: Endoscopic remission based on SES-CD total score

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Clinical Response
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical response by PRO based on SF and AP

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in C-Reactive Protein
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in c-reactive protein

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Fecal Calprotectin
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in fecal calprotectin

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire (IBDQ)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline on the IBDQ

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants must have completed study I6T-MC-AMAG (NCT02891226) or study I6T-MC-AMAM (NCT03926130)
- If female, participant must meet the contraception requirements
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants must not have developed a new condition, including cancer in the previous study (I6T-MC-AMAG or I6T-MC-AMAM)
- Participants must not have any important infections including, but not limited to, hepatitis B, hepatitis C, HIV/AIDS, and active tuberculosis (TB) during either previous study
- Participants may not have received surgery for Crohn's disease in the originator study or are likely to require surgery for treatment of Crohn's disease during the study
- Participants must not have developed adenomatous polyps during the originator study that have not been removed prior to the start of this study

link.description: A Long-term Extension Study of Mirikizumab (LY3074828) in Participants With Crohn's Disease

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonymized individual patient level data will be provided in a secure access environment upon approval of a research proposal and a signed data sharing agreement.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data are available 6 months after the primary publication and approval of the indication studied in the US and EU, whichever is later. Data will be indefinitely available for requesting.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: A research proposal must be approved by an independent review panel and researchers must sign a data sharing agreement.
